name: Forest Maze (Gopher Tree Games)
description: Platformer, where you must navigate a simple forest maze by jumping from branch to branch.  Control is one-handed, where a jump will occur if you are holding the control in the correct direction at the appropriate jump point.  Enable hints to be guided through the maze (takes about a minute and a half to navigate the maze).  Originally built for the Pineapple Jam of 2022 (theme was Speed), this did not get completed in time for entry into the jam.
